Detection of Windows Event IDs indicatin.Data: Windows Event ID 4723, Windows Event ID 4724
Detection of Windows Event IDs indicatin.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4723 and 4724 on Domain Controllers. Analyze the rate and frequency of password change/reset attempts per user or system. Identify users/systems with significantly higher-than-average rates using descriptive statistics (e.g., mean, standard deviation, or box plots) and investigate.

Detection of Windows Event IDs indicatin.Data: Windows Event ID 4726, Windows Event ID 4740, Windows Event ID 4688
Detection of Windows Event IDs indicatin.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4726 (Account Deletion) and 4740 (Account Lockout). Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for process creations involving 'net.exe' or 'passwd' with command line arguments related to account deletion or lockout. Correlate these events with other suspicious activity occurring on the same system or involving the same user account. Use time series analysis to detect spikes in account lockouts or deletions.
